dreams.name: White Marble
dreams.thedream: White marble hands statue on a hill covered with grass, then the hands started bleeding. I feel in awe of somethimg unknown yet, beyond myself

dreams.name: 1 million dollar
dreams.thedream: I visit to Las Vegas to play gamble, and won 1 million dollars. I was so happy.

dreams.name: paradise island
dreams.thedream: I've a dream. Its like an island, nice weather. Like a resort.

dreams.name: boat into space
dreams.thedream: January 14, 2009. A recurring nightmare, since childhood. A thief threatens me, I try to scream but I freeze, thieves wanted to enter my house, I can not scream. Ale Falabella lives near there. Anguish..
